definition: Hong Kong government
Hong Kong, abbr. for 香港[Xiang1 gang3]/surname Gang

seat of government/government repository (archive)/official residence/mansion/presidential palace/(honorific) Your home/prefecture (from Tang to Qing times)

sentences.english: The clock tower affair has set the alarm bells ringing.
sentences.chinese: 今次天星鐘樓事件，爲港府吸納民意的機制敲響警鐘。

sentences.english: The chilly wind bleak, staged a thrilling scene of supernatural events.
sentences.chinese: 陰風慘淡的港府，上演着一幕幕驚心動魄的靈異事件。

sentences.english: The government has proposed heavier penalties on animal abuse in April this year.
sentences.chinese: 港府於今年四月建議加強虐畜罪行的罰則。

sentences.english: The government has also considered raising therates charged at public hospitals.
sentences.chinese: 港府也考慮提高公立醫院收費價格。

sentences.english: Government departments concerned to follow up the matter and provide all possible assistance.
sentences.chinese: 港府有關部門繼續跟進事件，並提供一切可行的協助。
